--- title: "American Community Survey (ACS)" author: "Ігор Мірошниченко" date: today date-format: iso image: featured.jpg number-sections: false # execute: # freeze: auto categories: - csv --- ::: {.column-margin} ![](featured.jpg){width=100%} ::: ## Опис The data in this problem set come from the 2018 American Community Survey (ACS), which I downloaded from [IPUMS](https://ipums.org/). The dataset contains the following variables: | Variable | Description | |----------|-------------| | `fips` | County FIPS code | | `hh_size` | Household size (number of people) | | `hh_income` | Household total income in $10,000 | | `cost_housing` | Household's total reported cost of housing | | `n_vehicles` | Household's number of vehicles | | `hh_share_nonwhite` | Share of household members identifying as non-white ethnicities | | `i_renter` | Binary indicator for whether any household members are renters | | `i_moved` | Binary indicator for whether a household member moved in prior 1 year | | `i_foodstamp` | Binary indicator for whether any household member participates in foodstamps | | `i_smartphone` | Binary indicator for whether a household member owns a smartphone | | `i_internet` | Binary indicator for whether the household has access to the internet | | `time_commuting` | Average time spent commuting per day by each household member (minutes) | ## Дані [{{< iconify material-symbols download >}}](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Aranaur/aranaur.rbind.io/main/datasets/ACS/ACS.csv) ::: {#d3359659 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Aranaur/aranaur.rbind.io/main/datasets/ACS/ACS.csv" ``` ::: ::: {#798b35a9 .cell execution_count=2} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
